name: taiko
description: An easy to use wrapper over Chrome Remote Interface.

scripts.format: js-beautify lib/*.js test/*.js -r -b collapse,preserve-inline && npm run lint
scripts.doc-new: documentation build lib/taiko.js -f md --shallow -o docs/index.md --markdown-toc=false && node docs/setup.js --new
scripts.doc: documentation build lib/taiko.js -f md --shallow -o docs/index.md --markdown-toc=false && node docs/setup.js
scripts.test-functional: cd test/functional-tests && npm install && npm test

author: getgauge
